Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory528.jpg'}
{2: 'All right, this should do the trick now.', 3: '4'}
{3: 'After sorting out the last glitch, the cinema is up and running again.'}
{3: "But just to be safe, you run another check to make sure everything's shipshape before letting everyone in."}
{3: 'Weird, everything seemed fine just yesterday...'}
{2: '??', 3: "As expected, Babylonia's gotten so cocky it's using its prized asset as a mere maintenance worker?"}
{1: '1', 3: 'A cold voice pipes up from behind. Turning around, you spot her familiar white hair.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "To think that you've let your guard down this much and let an Ascendant infiltrate this place so easily just because it's a festival.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "As the commandant, don't you think you should weigh in?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I do think even while we're soaking up the festival vibes, everyone's still got their responsibilities.", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Only those comrades keen on the fest get smooth entry right now.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Comrades... Hmph...', 4: '1'}
{3: "That being said, Alpha's sudden appearance has caught you off guard. She rarely shows up in bustling spots like this."}
{3: 'You are about to ask when you notice something different about her usual getup: a dark green ribbon tied around her high bun.'}
{3: 'You remember giving her that ribbon last year.'}
{3: 'Alpha catches my eye.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "A useless trinket with indistinctive color... I don't even know why I took it back then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'But she wears it anyway, huh... You keep that to yourself.'}
{3: 'Looking at the ribbon, a thought strikes you out of nowhere.'}
{2: 'Could it be you came here just for me?', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What if I said yes?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without beating around the bush, she comes at you with a swift, decisive move, like drawing a sword.'}
{3: 'You are left speechless.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Heh, just as I expected. Take this as a return gift for your surprise visit last year.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "But don't expect more. I didn't bring a gift for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No worries, I was just thinking of how to invite you to the festival.', 3: '34'}
{3: 'Seeing Alpha momentarily speechless, you grin, taking back control, and you keep the conversation rolling on the festival.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Since you're here, how about catching a movie?", 3: '40'}
{2: 'Do you dig action flicks?', 3: '41'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Oh, are we doing stereotypes? Do you like superhero movies, then?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Eh, they're all right.", 3: '45', 4: "If I could, I'd actually want to be one of them.", 5: '45', 6: 'Yup, I do.', 7: '45'}
{2: "Let's see what's playing today...", 3: '46'}
{2: "Hmm... thanks to Valentine's Day, it's all rom-coms...", 3: '47'}
{2: 'Not your jam?', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "All characters trapped in a plot's web, fighting in vain to meet someone else's ending.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I'm not a fan.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That logic... Classic Alpha.', 3: '53'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Instead of watching others' predetermined futures on screen, how about directing our own movie in reality?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha hands you somethingâ€”a small, crystal-clear mineral: a natural diamond.'}
{3: "Formed under extreme conditions, unyielding and unbreakable, it's the hardest substance in nature."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Found it on a climb.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Keep it safe; consider it the down payment for the leading role.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'The contract is signed. Just remember to save a slot in your schedule for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Rest assured, whether it's the Punishing Virus, the Ascension-Network, or fate itself, any script that binds us, I'll cut through.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "We'll make sure our ending heads in the direction we choose.", 4: '1'}
